description: Spike and The Spike are the names of several fictional characters in Marvel Comics.  Recent characters of this name have had similar powers to generate projectile spikes, possibly inspired by Spyke from X-Men: Evolution.The Spike is a character in the X-Statix series from Marvel Comics. He first appeared in X-Force #121, and was created by Peter Milligan and Mike Allred. He is a mutant with superhuman powers. He should not be confused with Spike Freeman, another character in X-Statix/X-Force.Spike is also the name of a similar character from New X-Men, and also appeared in the film X-Men: The Last Stand, albeit as a villain with no apparent connection to the more commonly known character, aside from name and powers.
name: The Spike
powers: Ability to generate bone spike projectiles
